description: On Ubuntu 22.04 you can install but game not working. I try 4 games.
dl large games like sw2 or 2077 states no space even tho i have 137gb. small games like descent fail cuz wine extraction fails.will update rating ifnwhen is fixed
it may be i need linux, i thoght it meant it was compairable to linux, if you have linux i would debate getting it, but yeah if i could use it it seems decent!

GOG has no desire to release Galaxy client for Linux, minigalaxy comes to play. It's in its fairly new stages but already accomplishes so much. Thanks to minigalaxy I get to play more games from GOG that otherwise would be in my library getting digital dust.
I got it ultima iv working with minimal effort. I would recommend giving it a try as it seems to manage wine for the user
Works without any issuses and makes downloading and installing GOG Games with multiple .bin files very easy and comfortable.

This really works very well - last time i tried it it didn't,
but now it's doing very well.
Only one feature I couldn't find is the "sync to cloud"
one, I like that idea since I know all my saves are safe 
like that. 
Thank to the Devs for their hard work!

I've been trying to find something that actually works - 
at first, Minigalaxy wouldn't work right, but with this last
version, it all works very well. It takes a while to
understand how to work it - 
For me, this is the best GoG Galaxy client for Linux out
there, would be nice to see more features like cloud sync,
But I'm happy to have what's there.
I'm able to install/uninstall/update/run games and there's
tweaking available too. 
I like the idea on how it makes a custom prefix
for each Windows game, but links the 
"Documents/My Games" from the /home/user folder.
Thanks to the Minigalaxy project for your hard work!
Tonta y necesita ser mas estupida o que

Simple et efficace.
Je peux intaller et jouer à mes jeux gog sur Ubuntu.
Super !

GOG Galaxy refusant de s'installer, j'ai contourné le problème en installant Minigalaxy + PlayOnLinux + Wine (sans oublier les dépendances).
Ensuite lancer Minigalaxy: se connecter à son compte GOG en fournissant login et mot de passe, et j'ai retrouvé mes jeux:
- mes jeux compatibles Windows (19) ne s'affichent pas,
- seuls mes jeux compatibles Linux (14) sont visibles.
Чтобы показывал игры, надо их купить в ГОГе
